name: Dan Alexandru
body:
## Dan Alexandru @xR86

#### My work
 - [xR86/cluster-garage](https://github.com/xR86/cluster-garage) - a SPA for team management that uses the Mongo, Node.js+Express, Angular and Grunt 
 - [xR86/tw-project](https://github.com/xR86/tw-project) - a web app meant to visualize and filter FreeCodeCamp open data (uses a java json parser to parse the data into a relational database, after which the Node.js web app can query the data) - **responsible for** architecting the app, writing specs & coordinating team effort, frontend and helping on DB/backend side
 - [xR86/rc-project](https://github.com/xR86/rc-project) - a C application that makes use of openssl to encrypt the flow between a server and a client (**in progress**)
 - [2B5/ip-2B5](https://github.com/2B5/ip-2B5) - a java application that constructs a graph based on building schematics and serializes the data - responsible for git workflow, architecture and writing minimal testing
 - [xR86/scripts](https://github.com/xR86/scripts) - various scripts i use in my day-to-day work

### Useful links
 - my linkedin page: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dan-alexandru-8329a4b5
 - my student page: http://students.info.uaic.ro/~dan.alexandru/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
